posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.36 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group .

Release notes:

  • Now you can easily see all of your unread chats by pulling down in the chat list. Quickly filter what’s unread, but feel free to take your time while deciding whether or not to leave them on read.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.35 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.36.0.416-beta

62 new commits since 7.35.0.408-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.36 [1]

  • include flagged looping videos in media gallery gif query [2]

  • Don’t use escaping block for awaitableWrite [3]

  • Asyncify Storage Service operations [4]

  • Use inout mutable Storage Service state [5]

  • Asyncify PaymentProcessingOperation [6]

  • Make backup media list endpoint handling more efficient [7]

  • De-OWSOperation PaymentProcessingOperation [8]

  • Remove missingDevicesCache [9]

  • Add post-scan device linking UI [10]

  • Simplify REST batching & ACKing logic [11]

  • Squash JobQueue and MessageSenderJobQueue [12]

  • Clean up MessageSenderJobQueue [13]

  • Update to the latest Backup integration test cases [14]

  • Upgrade our Swift-Protobuf version [15]

  • Fix testEarlyServerGeneratedDeliveryReceipt [16]

  • Add encryption mode to backups for link'n'sync support [17]

  • Add link'n'sync ephemeralBackupKey provisioning proto [18]

  • Add tokenIdentifier to device provisioning code response [19]

  • Add LinkNSyncManager skeleton [20]

  • Implement primary side of link'n'syncManager [21]

  • Implement linked device side of link'n'syncManager [22]

  • Hook up link'n'sync (dev only, without error handling) [23]

  • Add Link'n'Sync capability to Provisioning QR code [24]

  • Update RingRTC to v2.48.4 [25]

  • Add view-once messages to backups [26]

  • Add basic xcconfigs with support for user build settings […] [27]

  • Use Xcode 16.1 on CI [28]

  • Fix stall in waitForProcessingComplete [29]

  • Always proactively finish filter icon animation […] [30]

  • Disable CLV data source updates when not visible. [31]

  • Use remote config value to determine which transit tier attachments we auto-download off backups [32]

  • Generate, persist, and read/write MediaRootBackupKey aka MrBurgerKing [33]

  • switch to v2/calling/relays endpoint [34]

  • Update title & icon of menu item to clear unread filter [35]

  • Fix assertions after disabling payments [36]

  • Asyncify more of Storage Service [37]

  • Improve MessageSenderJobQueue fetching [38]

  • Decode a bunch of JSON constants [39]

  • Remove exclusiveProcessIdentifier almost everywhere [40]

  • Revert SNI header changes [41]

  • Redesign device linking scanner with photo picker [42]

  • Stop persisting a ReceiptCredentialPresentation on job records [43]

  • Fix docked Filtered by Unread button not being tappable [44]

  • Clean up SDSDatabaseStorage's layers and layers of methods [45]

  • Turn off libsignal-net shadowing experiment by default [46]

  • Animate changes to the chat list immediately with pull-to-filter gesture [47]

  • Increase default size of filter icon, adjust animation timing [48]

  • Handle long text in edit message history view [49]

  • remove unnecessary @objc from SDSDatabaseStorage [50]

  • Add internal-only UI to display verbose backup errors [51]

  • Manually rollback or crash if Attachment v2 writes partially fail [52]

  • Make unread filter icon turn blue when activated [53]

  • Use NSFileManager instead of SSZipArchive [54]

  • Use "heavy" haptic feedback style for unread filter [55]

  • Add database writeWithTxCompletion variants [56]

  • Rollback failed backups [57]

  • Fix issue where ChatListFilterControl gets misplaced after marking as read [58]

  • Enable Filter by Unread in beta [59]

  • Enable filter-by-unread for all users [60]

  • Update release notes [61]

  • Update translations [62]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.35.0.408-beta…7.36.0.416-beta

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.

After enabling the unread messages filter, swiping down a second time plays an unusual blue animation and does not clear the filter:

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.36.0/99ce90072a2180aacdfad9139c7e43fdd627a845c1ceccf8353be8ea8891cb0c.zip

The “filter unread” menu item has a black icon when in dark mode:

IMG_9615574×560 32.6 KB

(The Spanish translation also has a random capital N for the word “no” when it should probably be lowercase)
Weird message layout after editing:

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked:
This is still a thing :D

Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.32 release

Little thing but while it activates in archive if you swipe (shows icon at the top and button to clear at the bottom), it doesn’t seem to do anything, at least if i don’t have any unread chats there. Maybe just doesn’t show the “no unread” UI like in the regular chat list.

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.32 release

posts.name: link ✦
posts.cooked: Profile picture menu unread filter icon doesn’t support dark mode :p
When verificating a users safety number via the settings of a group, the verificated batch doesn’t appear instantly but only after closing and opening the settings again.

posts.name: Paul Schon
posts.cooked:
I‘m not running the beta on my iPad, but noticed, that every time I open the camera when having the iPad in landscape mode, the camera pic is rotated by 90°. When turning the iPad into landscape mode and back, the picture is corrected.
Is this reproducible for you?

posts.name: Florian Stoeger
posts.cooked:
I’ll note that on this build, I can no longer open Signal because it crashes every time I try to open it (before this morning I used this build without any issues for a few days now since it was released)

(Submitted debug logs to support@signal.org)

Had a bit of a bug on the message preview when there’s a spoiler tag.

image1169×406 30 KB

The spoiler text was on the same line as the rest of the text. When viewing the message in the rest of the conversation it is formatted/aligned correctly.

Version 7.34 (403)

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Thanks for submitting! If you have any .ips files (Crash Reports), those will be super helpful as well.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
FYI to all, we’ve decided to hold filter-by-unread as a feature in beta for another week so we can collect more feedback. Consequently, the 7.36 release that goes to the App Store will not have the release notes I posted originally (and filter-by-unread will not be enabled), and will instead be submitted with the release notes below!

Introducing Call Links: The missing link for calendar invites and impromptu gatherings.
• Now you can quickly create an easy link that anyone on Signal can use to join a group call without having to join a Signal group chat first.
• Call links are reusable and ideal for recurring phone dates with your best friends or weekly check-ins with your coworkers.
• You can manage your call links, control approval settings, and copy links from the calls tab for quick sharing.

New Version: 7.36.0.428-beta

5 new commits since 7.36.0.416-beta (+ 2 commits omitted):

  • Fix filter by unread icon rendering in dark mode [1]

  • Enable Filter by Unread in beta [2]

  • Update translations [3]

  • Update release notes [4]

  • Ignore read cache when updating TSAttachment schema version [5]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.36.0.416-beta…7.36.0.428-beta

Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.37 release

posts.cooked:
Signal reproducibly crashes when tapping the call tab with three missed calls while on a Signal call, call ended with the crash
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.36.0/d0326769ac68ef6a5fabc7e724089fe9043df284f3d5d2509178e0af48837711.zip

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.37 release.
